Background

First Descent by Ron Lebfrom and Conrad Wentzel
{{#ev:vimeo|212544655}}
Matt Maxon planned the route after several probes in the area by both himself and Bernd Haase.
The exit was cleared by Matt Maxon and Ron Lebfrom to ensure we did not meet a wall of brush on the exit.
Ron Lebfrom made a water drop on top of the ridge to sustain overnight camping on the ridge for the
probe of the upper part of the canyon.
{{#ev:vimeo|197601152}}
RedRock canyon contains mines that were believed to be originally from the Spaniards. Many explorers have tried to reach the mines. The waterfalls were always the cruxes for the mine exploration. The Legendary Hugh Blanchard has a lot of information on the exploration attempts of the mines in Redrock canyon.
